div.h2: The service. The standards. The life.

a.div: Great service is one of the things we think about most. We start with selecting passionate people. Then we let them put that passion to work. Our people are a vital part of what shapes the character of each Avalon community.

We strive to align our standards with yours, delivering an experience that lives up to them. We know you've put a lot into getting to where you are in life. We believe where you live should reflect that. So we put ourselves into making sure it does.

Effortless. Enjoyable. Truly comfortable living is both. That's why we go out of our way to choose locations and to design amenities that put so much within reach. So you can live easy without even trying.

div.div: Room dimensions, square footage, and features shown on the floor plan drawings are approximate and may vary between individual apartments that have similar layouts. Furniture shown on the floor plan drawings is representative and individual apartments come unfurnished unless specified otherwise. Quoted rent is per month for new move-ins to the community, based on the move-in date selected. Pricing may vary based on lease term. Quoted rent does not including other fees and charges that may be part of your lease (i.e. utilities, parking, etc.). Please contact the community for details. Prior to signing a lease, quoted rent, specials, availability, and other terms and conditions are subject to change without notice. Washington State - We require our own screening and do not accept comprehensive reusable tenant screening reports.

div.p: Curious about the community layout? You can download the community site map here.

div.h2: Only the best for your best life

div.class: ant-typography feature-card-desc font-default text-center font-weight-normal text-center

a.div: See what we do to take pet friendly living to the next level.

div.class: ant-typography feature-card-desc font-default text-center font-weight-normal text-center

a.div: Our apartment homes were designed with you in mind. Learn more about the different finish packages we offer at our community.

div.class: ant-typography feature-card-desc font-default text-center font-weight-normal text-center

a.div: From fitness amenities to resident perks, we offer a variety of spaces and places to help you meet your wellness goals.

div.class: ant-typography feature-card-desc font-default text-center font-weight-normal text-center

a.div: Our technology package gives you ease of access and can allow you to save on monthly expenses.

div.class: ant-typography feature-card-desc font-default text-center font-weight-normal text-center

a.div: Start earning points on rent with our free residents reward program. Use your points for travel, future rent credit, fitness classes, and more.

div.class: ant-typography feature-card-desc font-default text-center font-weight-normal text-center

a.div: Pay rent, find policies, and more with our convenient online resident portal.

div.class: ant-typography feature-card-desc font-default text-center font-weight-normal text-center

a.div: Offering a wealth of resident resources, our Relocation Advantage program assists in making your transition a smooth one.

h3.class: ant-typography community-amenities-title font-primary font-24 text-default font-weight-normal

div.div: Renovated fitness center and fitness studio with TRX equipment
Upgrade any home to Furnished+ including all the essentials you need to move right in plus flexible lease terms, included utilities, and immediate access to highspeed Wi-Fi and cable TV.

Live Up."},"displayProperties":{},"localEdits":{},"variants":{}}}]},{"collection":"features","type":"CORE_CommunityDetailPage/CommunityDescription","props":{"collection":"features","type":"CORE_CommunityDetailPage/CommunityDescription","id":"f0fGzIJ4VKB1abk","contentConfig":{"contentService":"","contentConfigValues":{},"inherit":true},"customFields":{"title":"Make Yourself at Home","description":"We believe elevating where you live is about blending it seamlessly with how you live. We go to great lengths designing amenities and choosing locations that put everything within reach. Where you live, is where you come alive. Welcome to spacious and homely apartments at Avalon Oak Creek. Here, you'll uncover an amazing series of one- and two-bedroom Agoura Hills apartments that you'll be happy to call home. Our thoughtfully designed rentals boast superb features like abundant storage space, satellite TV, private balconies, spacious linen, walk-in closets, and disability access. Upgrade any home to Furnished+ and enjoy the convenience of turnkey living. Residents are also privy to a wide range of community facilities such as barbecue grills, fitness center and studio, lounge with kitchenette and game area, and a swimming pool. Plus, our technology package, AvalonConnect, offers high-speed and common area WiFi, digital resident services including the ability to submit service requests and pay your rent online, Amazon package lockers, and more. The impressive blend of excellent amenities and a friendly and responsive on-site staff make Avalon Oak Creek a great place to live. These brand-new Agoura Hills apartments are perfectly situated near great shopping at The Promenade at Westlake and a day of fun in Malibu Creek State Park. If you like horse riding, you're in for a treat as you can visit the Malibu Riders Inc. or the Adventures on Horseback stables. As a resident of Avalon Oak Creek, you will also find easy access to a plethora of services in Los Angeles County. If you decide on being a resident at our Agoura Hills apartments you will also experience the Avalon Advantage. This amazing program provides exclusive advantages and assurances to residents such as flexible lease terms, online rent payment and an incredibly helpful national relocation program. Avalon offers a wonderful life for you and your family. Discover your ideal home today! Contact us to schedule an appointment and discover the best Agoura Hills apartments in California right now!","previewWordCount":50},"displayProperties":{},"localEdits":{},"variants":{}}},{"collection":"features","type":"CORE_CommunityDetailPage/PricingOverview","props":{"collection":"features","type":"CORE_CommunityDetailPage/PricingOverview","id":"f0fjiSI7VKB1anJ","contentConfig":{"contentService":"","contentConfigValues":{},"inherit":true},"customFields":{"imgSrc":"https://cloudfront-us-east-1.images.arcpublishing.com/avalonbay/GXSAHEHZHFHK7KWYDH6Y5QPGIM.jpg","furnishedDescription":"Furnished+ offers all the essential items you need to move in plus conveniences like flexible lease terms, included utilities, and immediate access to highspeed Wi-Fi and cable TV.","imgAlt":null},"displayProperties":{},"localEdits":{},"variants":{}}},{"collection":"chains","type":"CORE_CommunityBrandCards","props":{"collection":"chains","type":"CORE_CommunityBrandCards","id":"c0fGsoKpVKB1a7E","customFields":{"title":"The service.\nThe standards.\nThe life."},"displayProperties":{}},"children":[{"collection":"features","type":"CORE_CommunityDetailPage/CommunityBrandCard","props":{"collection":"features","type":"CORE_CommunityDetailPage/CommunityBrandCard","id":"f0fBas9bVKB1aR4","contentConfig":{"contentService":"","contentConfigValues":{},"inherit":true},"customFields":{"title":"The Service","link":"/","description":"Great service is one of the things we think about most.
